name: Dvalinn, the Herald of Continuation
text:
Continuous: If there are no cards with the word "Yggdrasil" in its name in any field, Activate. of this card cannot be used.
Enter: Search for a card named "Duneyrr, the Herald of Change", from your main deck, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your main deck.
Activate. Discard a card named "Duneyrr, the Herald of Change" from your hand: Recover this card. This ability can be activated only once per turn.
